# LinkedIn Resume Builder Project

## Project Overview
A Python-based web application that scrapes LinkedIn profiles and generates downloadable PDF resumes.

## Technology Stack
- Python 3.8+
- Flask (Web Framework)
- Selenium (LinkedIn Scraping)
- ReportLab/FPDF (PDF Generation)
- HTML/CSS (Templates)

## Project Status
✅ Project structure created
⏳ In development
